/******************
      Author : Aditya Varma
      Problem: http://www.codechef.com/problems/COMP03
********************************/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>

int convert_to_decimal(int num,int base)
{
  /*********
	 Num is a number in base, base.
	 Return a number converted to its equivalent base 10
  *************/
  int power,decimal,temp,temp2;
  power = 0;//Keeps count to power of base
  decimal = 0;//Decimal number
  while(num>0)
    {
      temp = num%10;//Stores the last number
      temp2 = pow(base,power);
      num = num/10;//Reduces the number
      decimal += temp*temp2;//stores the decimal number
      power++;//Incrementing the power
    }
  return decimal;//returns the equivalent decimal value
}


int main()
{
  int N,a,b,ans;
 // freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
  scanf("%d",&N);
  while(N--)
    {
      scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
      if(b!=10)
	{
	  a = convert_to_decimal(a,b);
	}
      printf("%c",a);
    }
  printf("\n");
  return 0;
}
